plot outline: Lakshmana is a happy-go-lucky soul, but has a hidden truth. Anjali, too, a happy person, is on a mission to avenge a personal loss. The two seem to be star-crossed for they not only fall in love after meeting in college but realize they are on the same path for revenge.
title: Lakshmana
plot: _Lakshmana_ (qv) is a happy-go-lucky soul, but has a hidden truth. Anjali, too, a happy person, is on a mission to avenge a personal loss. The two seem to be star-crossed for they not only fall in love after meeting in college but realize they are on the same path for revenge.
